title_reason: When naming it, I thought about this fragmented era and how to grow within it. The name combines the ideas of 'Rebirth' and 'Vortex', symbolizing being reborn from the fragments.
slogan: An information management tool for the AI era. Revornix helps you efficiently consolidate all visible information and provides you with a complete report at a specific time.
wecom_tips: You can join our community group by scanning the QR code below with WeChat.
feature_1_tips: Currently supports web, with iOS app and WeChat mini-program support coming soon.
feature_2_tips: Collects information in one place, including news, blogs, forums, etc.
feature_3_tips: Uses multimodal large models to convert files into Markdown format.
feature_4_tips: We use industry-leading Milvus as the vector storage engine, supporting vector search.
feature_5_tips: All data is stored locally, eliminating concerns about data leakage.
feature_6_tips: Core code is fully open sourceâ€”contributions are welcome.
